argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_zcn | |- ( N e. ZZ -> N e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | #P_1cnd | |- ( N e. ZZ -> 1 e. CC ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_negsubdid | |- ( N e. ZZ -> -u ( N - 1 ) = ( -u N + 1 ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_znegcl | |- ( N e. ZZ -> -u N e. ZZ ) |
| 5 |  | #P_peano2z | |- ( -u N e. ZZ -> ( -u N + 1 ) e. ZZ ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syl | |- ( N e. ZZ -> ( -u N + 1 ) e. ZZ ) |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( N e. ZZ -> -u ( N - 1 ) e. ZZ ) |
| 8 | 1, 2 | #P_subcld | |- ( N e. ZZ -> ( N - 1 ) e. CC ) |
| 9 |  | #P_znegclb | |- ( ( N - 1 ) e. CC -> ( ( N - 1 ) e. ZZ <-> -u ( N - 1 ) e. ZZ ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( N e. ZZ -> ( ( N - 1 ) e. ZZ <-> -u ( N - 1 ) e. ZZ ) ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_mpbird | |- ( N e. ZZ -> ( N - 1 ) e. ZZ ) |
